notes:
Vienna, Dec. 15
What will come next?

We seriously doubt that 
(a) This passport belongs to the scammer 
(b) the scammer's name is Soo Cho 
(c) the moon is made of green cheese. But you knew that.



Back to business,below is the bank information,i would advice you reach them
ASAP

get application for opening account and fill the forms and open up the
account

immediately.I want us to round off this transfer before the christmas break
all documents 

are in serious progress by Mok Seng,Liza we have spent so much money on this
transaction to make sure all the documents and people that matters are been
taken care of,so that there wont be an eye brow about this wire to this bank
you will open an account with.

  Bank info:

GLOBENET FINANCE AND TRUST

globenet-fins.com

Account officer: Jeremy Devin

gloaccounts@globenet-fins.com

Customer Service:FAX:1 (888) 895-1977

TEL:1 (800) 235-6801 

Please call them up and send an email to the accounting officer,

make enquiries and activate the account,liza mind you time is not on our
side.

Please respond to me with the bank account number and other information so
that

i can conclude the documentation and commence transfer immediately.

We will surely smile before the Xmas celebration in Jesus name.

 

I think, i am beginning to have so much trust in you,because you earned it
and please

do not disappoint me for any reason and may the Almighty God see us through
this period of this transaction.

 

Hoping to hear from you soonest and do acknowledge the receipt of this mail.

I have to confess that i am very glad in my heart that i met with you.

 

Remain blessed in the bossom of the lord.

Soo
"Liza's" image altered a little to protect the innocent.

But no! This is the end...

Greetings from Vienna zoo!

I'm sending you the final part of the correspondence between me and my korean
business associate Mr. Soo Cho. 
Unfortunately Mr. Soo has broken off our promising transaction without a single
word of explanation. I thought it would become a lifelong partnership between
Vienna and Seoul but as we all know the plans of THE ALLMIGHTY are
unpredictable. 
I'm suspecting Choey hates ant-eaters, maybe that's the reason why he abandoned
our business deal.

I must admit I'll miss him a little bit, although I know he is a thief Choey
was in spite of all a rather polite and patient guy. 

Now here are the remaining emails:

messages.body:
Dec. 4
Mr.Soo Cho
CHO HUNG BANK.
14 1-ka Namdaemun-ro Chung-ku
Seoul, Seoul 100-757
South Korea.
www.chohungbank.co.kr
I am Mr.Soo Cho, credit officer of CHO HUNG BANK. I have an
urgent and very confidential business proposition for you.
On July 8, 2000, a British Oil consultant/contractor with
the South Korea Solid Minerals Corporation, Mr. Phillip
Morris made a numbered time (Fixed) Deposit for twelve
calendar months, valued at (Twenty-eight Million Three
Hundred Thousand American Dollars only) in my branch.
Upon maturity,I sent a routine notification to his
forwarding address but got no reply. After a month, we sent
a reminder and finally we discovered from his contract
employers, that Mr. Phillip Morris died from an auto-mobile
accident.
On further investigation, I found out that he died without
making a WILL,and all attempts to trace his next of kin was
fruitless.
I therefore made further investigation and discovered that
Mr.Phillip Morris did not declare any kin or relations in
all his official documents,including his Bank Deposit
paperwork in my Bank.This sum of $28,300,000.00 is still
sitting in my Bank and the interest is being rolled over
with the principal sum at the end of each year. No one will
ever come forward to claim it.
According to Laws of South Korea, at the expiration of
(five) years,the money will revert to the ownership of the
South Korea Government if nobody applies to claim the fund.
Consequently, my proposal is that I will like you as a
foreigner to stand in as the next of kin to Mr. Phillip
Morris so that the fruits of this old man's labor will not
get into the hands of some corrupt government officials.
This is simple, I will like you to provide immediately
your full names and address so that the attorney will
prepare the necessary documents and affidavits that will put
you in place as the next of kin. We shall employ the
services of an attorney for drafting and notarization of the
WILL and to obtain the necessary documents and letter of
probate/administration in your favor for the transfer.
A bank account in any part of the world that you will
provide the will, then facilitate the transfer of this
money to you as the beneficiary/next of kin.
The money will be paid into your account for us to share in
the ratio of 70%for me and 25% for you and 5% for Expenses
Incurred in the course of the transaction
.
There is no risk at all as all the paperwork for this
transaction will be done by the attorney and with my
position as the credit officer guarantees the successful
execution of this transaction. If you are interested, please
reply immediately to my email box.
Upon your response, I shall then provide you with more
details that will help you understand the transaction.
Please send me your confidential telephone and fax numbers
for easy communication.
You should observe utmost confidentiality, and rest assured
that this transaction would be most profitable for both of
us because I shall require your assistance to invest my
share in your country.
Regards,
Soo Cho
N.B:Endeavour to send your reply through my alternative
e-mail address:soo@financesource.com

messages.body:
Dec. 12
Dear Liza Krottenbacher,
Thank you very much for your response. I appreciate the fact that you are ready to assist me in executing this project. I look forward to meeting you. All further correspondence to me should be channeled through this email address.

First, I will want to know the type of occupation that you do and how old you are. You should note that this project is highly capital intensive. This is why I have to be very careful. I need your total devotion and trust to see this through. I know we have not met before, but I am very confident that we will be able to establish the necessary trust that we need to execute this project.

I have made all the necessary arrangements that will facilitate the transaction between us. As a seasoned banker i will introduce you to a bank where you will open an online account and i will deposit the funds in the account.

You should be aware that I cannot transfer this money in my name as my bank will be aware that it is from me. This is where I need you as the beneficiary to the WILL of Mr. Phillip Morris and based on this i will be able to transfer the funds to your account that you will open in the bank i will introduce to you. As soon as you have the online account opened i will prepare a WILL with you as the beneficiary to the funds and i will be able to place the funds in your account.

Before I commence, I will need you to send me the picture page of your international passport . As soon as I get all these from you , I will commence the project.

I am trying to get a satellite phone that will be very secured . Our local telephones lines could be intercepted easily, so they are not safe for the project. This is why I want to get a satellite phone .

I will send the number to you as soon as I get it.
I have to ensure that everything is just between you,i and my attorney.

Please ensure that you keep this project confidential, do not discuss it with anybody for security reasons and because of my work.


Thanks
Mr.Soo Cho

Dear Wolfgang Klose,
I am in receipt of your mail and quite impressed about your
prompt response and consistency.I am sorry for not including
your maiden name.
I got your information,which i will forward immediately to
my attorney,so that he can commence the documentation
of the WILL to bear your names and information.But you still
need to send accross to me a scanned passport page of your
international passport or drivers license.
Meanwhile i will send accross to you the information of the
bank you will open an accpunt with for us o transfer the funds into,
from where we can wire to our designated account in any part of
the world.
I would advice you call up my attorney (Mok Senng) on his mobile
number +447040103810,he has all the modalities for the final
execution of this transaction,all plans have been made for a hitch free
transaction.
More also i will send the bank information to you ASAP so that you
can open an account with them for us to transfer.
Please do acknowledge the receipt of this mail.
Thank you and remain blessed.
Soo

messages.body:
Dec. 13
Dear Mr. Soo Cho,
Many thanks for your update.
What is the matter with you? Who the hell is Mr. Wolfgang Klose? Is this the name of your attorney you mentioned in your last mail? The name sounds German, do you have business connections to Germany? It would things going easier for me to communicate in my mothers tongue.
By the way, you did not answer my crucial question how to solve the problem with Mr. Morris.
I was not by far related to him and since I am a serious person I would not like to come in conflict with Law and landing behind swedish gardines.
I must say, I am a little bit confused and I feel unsure if the whole thing is legal, Mr. Cho (is Soo your prename?), please answer the above questions in order to exclude all possibility of doubt.
Yours sincerely
Liza Krottenbacher-Schmerbauch, CEO

messages.body:
Datum: 12/16/04
Betreff: update

 

  

Dear Liza Krottenbacher-Schmerbauch,

 

How are you today,guess you are doing just fine.

I did not intentionally ignore your mail,i was quite busy with

office work and you know with the nature of this tranaction,i need to

be very careful about who is around me,that means "watching my back",

the external auditors were around for the end of year accounts audit.

 

I actually got your photograph,you  looked what i desired for this
transaction.

Your looks are trustworthy ,but your mind i cant tell,all things been equal

i feeel i can really trust you very much,but please dont dissappoint me for
any reason.

I also want you to believe and trust in me as much as i am trusting you with
this transaction,this dealings has to do with TRUST and CONFIDENTIALITY from
both parties.

 

Back to your questions

 1.

 

I did change my email accounts for security purpose and the free execution
of this tranaction.You should appreciate the AMOUNT involved in this.I just
have to be very careful with it,it is all my future and my family lies on right now,so based on this i just have to very careful.

 

2. 

 

This name Wolfgang Klose is a German businessman in Seoul and also a
customer of my bank,we had some problems with his account and it was among
the issues i was trying to sought out with the external auditors that came
to my bank for auditing. I was  trying to send him a mail at the same time i was sending yours too,so i made the mistake of typing his name across yours,i am indeed sorry about that.

 

3.

 

Madam i have earlier told you that Phillip Morris did not have any
beneficiary to his  WILL before he died and more also i and my attorney have gone to the judiciary and have made all the arrangements and documentations to make you the beneficiary to his WILL,you dont necessarily have to be his relations before he wills to you.

My attorney is declaring that you are business partner and making you the
only sole beneficiary to his WILL,all documents are been done to cover your
transactions with him.My attorney is very good and he is making all things possible to mak sure that all documents are done accordingly,we have spent so much moneys to make sure nobody raises any eye brow about this.

I have to assure you that there will not be any problems,if we dont do this now or in  the earliest time,the government will surely confiscate the money and i dont want this to happen,that is the more reason why we just have to act as fast as possible.

 

4.

 

I realise your fears and i quite see reasons with you,that is why i and my
attorney are doing everything possible so that there won't be any legal
problems,i reassure you to  relax your  mind and stop exhibiting any fears in this transaction.You should know nobody wants to go to jail,so based on this we all have to be very prayerful


 

5.

My name are Soo Cho.My first name is Cho and my surname is Soo.

Korean names are not as long as the names you answer in your country,the

names  are too ellaborate and difficult to pronounce,like yours Liza
Krottenbacher-Schmerbauch.

 

I hope i have tried to answer all your questions and satisfied your
curiousity and if you are still confused in any aspect please dont fail to
ask.

I have to reassure you that i really trust and believe in you concerning
this trabsaction,

so kindly dont execute any feras or distrust, it is said that TRUST is not
bought but earned,i think you earn it.

 

Please do respond to my mail ASAP,so that i can send across to you the bank
details for you to contact them.

Remember time is not on our side.

 

Remain blessed.

Soo

messages.body:
Datum: 12/16/04

An: soochho1@yahoo.com

Cc: coach4u@gmx.at

Betreff: what a relief

 

Dear Mr. Soo,

 

I breathed a sigh of relief when I've got your sign of life receiving your
last mail! I don't know why but in some respect I've embosomed you in my
heart already. 

I am very well overall only the preparations for christmas are a bit boring
and distressing for a mother of two spoiled sons.  

You know christmas? It is our most important religiosus celebration as
christians.

If no what religion do you believe in? (I hope you are not an atheist, I don
t like people who belief in nothing).

I believe in Jesus Christ as I trust in you, dear Cho! 

Hopefully you wont dislike this rather familiar form of adress, but vice
versa you can adress me "Liza".

Please if its possible, send me a picture of yours. I'd like to see with
whom I got in contact and please tell me something about you: Are you
married? Do you have children? What is your  zodiac sign?

Your explanations about the deceased Mr. Morris and his fund sound very
clearly and convincingly so that my fears and doubts have disappeared.

I would be very pleased if we could clinch the matter before christmas (24th
of Dec.)

 

Hope you are well in Seoul, lousy wheather here in Vienna, cold and foggy.

Have a nice day, 

 

I am waiting for your further instructions

 

Yours sincerely 
Liza

My Admired Cho,

You can not imagine how glad I am to deal with a man of faith! I believe
that our engagement is fated and nothing can obstruct the success of our
business transaction not even the Gottseibeiuns (this is what we call in
this country the ugly satanas!).

Thanks for your photograph, what a nice guy you look like! If I would not
have engaged in such a unique marriage it could bring me to an idea... 

Let us talk about hard facts since this is not the right place an the right
moment for let arising emotions.

First of all please take into account: I am slow of understanding, so that
is the reason why I must ask you a few simple questions:

1. Who is Mok Seng? Is this your confessor?  

2. Who is Jeremy Devin? 

3. Who is  GLOBENET FINANCE AND TRUST

and 

4. Who is ASAP? (it sounds dangerous for my ears)

5. Aren't you the director of chohungbank, if so why do not you manage all
the transactions trough this bank? (Please apologize my silly question, but
as I mentioned above sometimes I am dimwitted like a fence post).

There are too many names all at once. Please do not overstrain my mental
capacity!

As far a the mobilephone is concerned, I hate phoning with mobiles. They are
so expensive and on top of everything rather childish. By the way I have
established with some like-minded people a "Liga zur Abschaffung und
Vernichtung aller Mobiltelefone bis zum Jahr 2010" and I'm proud to tell you
that at our last meeting I was chosen to the president of our organisation.
So you cannot demand from me to communicate with a medium that I believe is
coming from satanas as well.

Lastly I donate to you the following prayer:

 

The Word

God speaks to each one of us individually. Read the text a few times, then
listen.

Matthew 1, 1-17

The book of the genealogy of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of
Abraham. Abraham was the father of Isaac, and Isaac the father of Jacob, and
Jacob the father of Judah and his brothers, and Judah the father or Perez
and Zerah by Tamar, and Perez the father of Hezron, and Hezron the father of
Amminadab the father of Nahson, and Nahson the father of Salmon, and Salmon
the father of Boaz by Rahab, and Boaz the father of Obed by Ruth, and Obed
the father Jesse, and Jesse the father of David the king. And David was the
father of Solomon by the wife of Uriah, and Solomon the father of Rehoboam
and Rehoboam the father of Abijah, and Abijah the father of Jehosophat, and
Jehosophat the father of Joram, and Joram the father of Uzziah, and Uzziah
the father of Jotham, and Jotham the father of Ahaz, and Ahaz the father of
Hezekiah, and Hezekiah the father of Manasseh, and Manasseh the father of
Amos, and Amos the father of Josiah, and Josiah the father of Jechoniah and
his brothers at the time of the deportation to Babylon. And after the
deportation to Babylon: Jechoniah was the father of Shealtiel, and Shealtiel
the father of Zerubbabel, and Zerubbabel the father of Abiud, and Abiud the
father of Eliakim, and Eliakim the father of Azor, and Azor the father of
Zadok, and Zadok the father of Achim, and Achim the father of Eliud, and
Eliud the father of Eleazar, and Eleazar the father of Matthan, and Matthan
the father of Jacob, and Jacob the father of Joseph the husband of Mary, of
whom Jesus was born, who is called Christ. So all the generations from
Abraham to David were fourteen generations, and from David to the
deportation to Babylon fourteen generations, and from the deportation to
Babylon to the Christ fourteen generations.

In God we trust.

I am waiting for your response.

 

Yours sincerely 

 

Liza

for you.

 

see classification/categories of our various accounts to choose from.

 

1. Private account with a minimum deposit of $6,300.= as opening balance,

serve a dual purpose of withdrawing via online and by checks, though with

dis-advantage of a maximum withdrawal of $500,000.= at a time.

balance, with maximum withdrawals of $1,000,000.=, though you can only

withdraw on line.

balance, no limit for withdrawals and can only transact transfers online.

any bank in the world, you will initiate the transfer yourself, but mind

you the minimum deposit has to be defraying to

 

Globenet Finance and trust, before this account can be functional.

-Visit our webpage www.globenet-fins.com

-Click on account registration

-Read through our disclaimer page and click accept

-Fill out the account registration form and click submit.

 

Yours in service,

 

Jeremy Devin

Betreff: i was so worried .I am sorry about kreti and plete


Dear Liza,

 

How are you today,guess fine despite the escape of KRETI and PLETE,

I am indeed sorry about it all,the lord Almighty knows best.Hope no soul 

was lost in the process,if not then we have to give glory to our father in

heaven for everything,but you seem to be forgetting that for every situation
we find

ourselves,the lord Almighty has told us we should always glorify him.

 I pray you find them,but come to think of it,where is your "faith".

 God is in control.I saw their picture and they look so lovely,dont you
think we can invest in zoo,what do you think?

 

Back to business,you made mention of:


You could be very correct,because we cannot take any chances with this
transaction or compromise it for anything.In that case i would advice you go
through the website and contact any other staff of the bank.

 Note,Jeremy as far as i know was the officer that handled the transaction i
made for Phillip Morris through the Globenet bank,as far back as 2000,so i
can't be too sure if he is still working with the bank.All things been equal
i would advice you go through the website and contact any other staff of the
bank as soon as possible,you remeber we have to get this transfer through
before the Xmas,so we have to be fast in what ever steps we are taking right
now, but also very careful too.

 

 I am desperate about coming over to Austria with my family.

 I went through the account options and as a banker i would give a
professional advice on our picking the number 3. account,which is the
off-shore account and transfer is unlimited,we wouldn't have enough time to
be transferring in bits of $500,000 or $1,000,000, we should be able to move
the funds either once or twice to  any bank of our choice bank in the world
am quite okay with that.

 

Do compete the transaction with the bank by opening the account with the
initial deposit and activate it so that i can have the account information
to complete the documentation,it is very important we include the bank you
wish to transfer the funds into before i can work on the transfer
immediately.

 

Dear madam,do you know you almost sent me to the hospital,when i did not
hear from you in two days,all my hopes and efforts were almost shattered

Betreff: new account at my house bank - to fasten our transaction


Dear Cho! 

(you didn't answer my question as far as the  pronunciation of your
firstname is concerned? Is it such as "Ho" in "Ho Chi Minh" or such as 
Tschi" in "Ho Chi Minh"?) 

 

How are you, my lucky star! Stormy weather here in the heart of Europe.

 

Ha! A CAPRICORN and a TAURUS (my zodiac sign) what a thrilling
constellation!

My friend, this means a lifelong partnership, not always without
complications but in the long run very satisfactory for both sides. 

 

It's a pity that you are not able to scare up a cheap credit for me. I
thought you a man of influence at the Chohung bank because the name of your
bank begins with your firstname, but I'm sure that you share the name with
the bank is purely accidental. 

 

In any case let's face our transaction. 

 

After I've opened an account with the GLOBENET bank at the caiman islands
the guys there directed me to the OCBC bank in Singapore with the following
adress: 

 

OCBC BANK
65 CHULIA STREET, SINGAPORE

SWIFT CODE: OCBC SGSG

A/C: NAME: B.D. PARIBAS (Globenet FT.)

A/C: 656-000221-301

 

The bankers at the OCBC bank offered me an exceedingly generous offshore
account with an initial payment of $12,500.= USD minimum deposit! Long long
ago my Grandma - God bless her soul ! - told me: If you send your money to
Singapore you will see it nevermore.

 

Having these wise words in mind and by applying my common sense I decided to
forget the caiman islands and Singapore as well (that's what is meant by "to
cut the Gordian knot").

 

My dear friend, you will agree with me that we need a bank outside of South
Korea we both can trust in and round the corner there is my house bank: THE
BANK OF LABOR AND COMMERCE,Vienna. 

 

In order to finish our business transaction ASAP I negotiated with the
director of the bank already, by the way I know him for more than twenty
years now as a man of trust and of a solid character. Of course I didn't
tell him a single word about our business deal but you would not believe it:
 he offered me a bank account with the minimum deposit of: NULLKOMMAJOSEF
EURO (Euro 0,00.- Zero Euro ) tutto completto. On the contrary, he even gave
me a credit balance of EURO 100,00.- So we can transfer the fund of Morris
Phillips immediately without any prepaid deposits. I think this must be
music in your ears. 

 

Here are the details of the new account at the BANK OF LABOR AND COMMERCE,
Vienna:

 

Name of the holder of the account:

Liza Krottenbacher-Schmerbauch

 

Account category: 

AAA (VIP because of the amount of the deposit in prospect)

 

Account No:

76234456/Sch

 

You can contact the director of the BANK OF LABOR AND COMMERCE, Mr.
Apollonius Fixlaudon, PH.D., directly through phone: +43 1 771232. 

 

I hope you will accept my proposal. I am looking forward to your positive
reply,

 

 

Kindly

 

Liza 

 

PS: I would be very pleased if you could get some informations about the
ant-eaters at the ZOO OF SEOUL, 159-1 Makgye-dongKwacheon-siKyonggi-do,
427-080 SEOUL City.

world with which we can manage the transfer of our fund without any problems.

transaction. As far as I'm concerned I'm still highly interested in it.

preparations transfering the amount of € 10,000 (ten thousand EURO only) into

pay the charges for our attorney Mok Sengg.

Liza
